p: Separating time series data into train, validation, and test sets requires care since all the temporal relations have to be maintained. Since COVID-19 is an infectious viral disease, it spreads over time. This means that we can predict the infections/deaths at a particular point of time based on preceding values. It is also essential to monitor the generalization capabilities of the model and select hyperparameters for the model accordingly.
